function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased healthcare expenditure","Impact":"Strain on government resources, potential budget deficits","Mitigation":"Identifying and addressing modifiable predictors of health and disease, reducing healthcare costs","Technologies":"Healthcare analytics, predictive modeling, telemedicine","People":"Government, taxpayers, healthcare providers, patients","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Contagious diseases propagation due to reduced well-being","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious diseases, higher healthcare utilization, and costs","Mitigation":"Enhancing population levels of well-being, promoting psychological flourishing","Technologies":"Telehealth platforms, mental health apps, community outreach programs","People":"General population, healthcare providers, public health authorities","Owner":"Public health authorities, healthcare organizations"}]}
